name: Cloudian Typhoon Lord
text:
2 level 4 WATER monsters
This card cannot be destroyed by battle. If this card is in face-up Defense Position, destroy it. If this card is Special Summoned: Place 2 Fog Counters on it for each "Cloudian" monster on the field. Once per turn: You can detach1 Xyz material from this card; add 1 "Cloudian" card from your Deck to your hand. Once per turn: You can remove 2 Fog Counters from the field; Destroy 1 card on the field.
